column4: So I have sound but the sound applet is a speaker with three dashes and I cannot control the audio slider known problem?
it may set to controll the 'pcm' channel, or some other channel. instead of the proper master channel.
no idea. ive had a few pc's that ive had to tweak to use PCM instead of 'master' (or visa versa)   but not had to do that in ages.
i never saw it broken... what do you mean.
what was broken... be a bit more clearn..
awh :( sorry to hear that, I would lend you one of my three, but y'know.
I want to though, I want to kill it.
answer is to switch to the classic desktop at GDM login
I want to remove the files too
i would say use an older release then.
its too embedded into differnt things..
so go for it then..  fire up package manager and see.
could I not install ubuntu alternative then install gnome 2/3 without unity (hooray)
11.04 comes with unity as its gnome...
the alternative cd - installs the normal desktop.. so yes it does.
